statements: UPDATE CustomerServiceResponses SET predicted_sentiment = 0.8 WHERE response_id = 1

UPDATE customer_service_responses SET response_text = 'Resolved the issue successfully' WHERE customer_id = 100 AND response_id = 5;
UPDATE predictive_analytics SET customer_name = 'John Doe', predicted_response_probability = 0.75 WHERE customer_id = 200;
UPDATE customer_data SET customer_name='John Doe' WHERE customer_id=101;
UPDATE predictive_models SET model_description='Improved model for customer segmentation' WHERE model_id=3;
UPDATE customer_service_responses SET response_text = 'Updated response text' WHERE response_id = 1

UPDATE customer_service_responses SET prediction_score = 0.85 WHERE id = 12345;
UPDATE customer_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Excellent service provided!' WHERE customer_id = 54321;
UPDATE customer_service_responses SET prediction_score = 0.87, prediction_accuracy = 0.92 WHERE response_category = 'Technical Support' AND customer_id = 1001;
UPDATE customer_history SET avg_response_time = 4.56, total_requests = total_requests + 1 WHERE customer_id = 2002;
UPDATE customer_data SET customer_name='John Doe', customer_email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE response_data SET response_text='Thank you for reaching out to us. We will get back to you shortly.', response_sentiment='Positive' WHERE response_id=1;
